root: ^I’m trying to brainstorm some ideas for a final project in my ‘Software Engineering For Noobs’ class. Do you think you could help a girl out?”

yes: ^I knew I could count on you! I was thinking of either a smart security system to put outside my house, or a Travel Buddy Finder app– I need someone to go to Rome with this summer! What do you think?
idea: ^Yeah, I was kind of favoring that idea to be honest! Hehehe, thanks for helping out! :)
^See you in class! It's the building to the far left if you don't remember!
